–But I don’t have anything to wear.
dialogue.speaker: We have to go now

dialogue.text: We’ll figure something out. Don’t you have anything in your nerd cave?
Nerd cave? It’s our mancave. I’m proud of it.
–We don’t joke about that. –Okay, tough guy. Do you have anything there then?
My old sweaty bandy clothes or Kevin and Didde’s stolen goods.
But maybe we shouldn’t use those.
Pay back or die, you little shits!
And where the fuck are all the vamp doses?!
You think we’re giving away free beer, or?
–That’s not what we meant. –Yeah, but how the hell did you mean it then?
We thought there was money on the account or the card.
You can shove your bank card up your ass. Got it?
But take it easy.
Give us the vamp doses right now. Otherwise we have a problem.
Oh! Sorry to disturb. We’re just grabbing some stuff.
But don’t mind me.
What are you doing? This isn’t a fucking drop-in.
Hey! Didn’t you hear what I said?
Get out of here!
Or I’ll smash your kneecaps.
Let him go.
Who the fuck are you?
Did you come straight from confirmation camp, or?
–Let him go –Shut up, you freak.
I don’t want to do this.
Get out of here before there’s an accident.
Eric, call an ambulance.
Elise, hold my bag.
Fuck!
No!
–Nice kick, Elise. –Thanks! Raised with four brothers.
So? Shall we get changed?
